text: No foreign or alien society shall transact business in the District without a certificate of authority issued by the Commissioner in accordance with §§ 31-4501 and 31-4502 and § 31-2502.21.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 35-1256.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-5301.

DC CODE § 31-5326

Current through December 11, 2012
